availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen A. Harris (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Harris. Father of James C. Harris and Alvah Harris. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 10.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 296A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Subdistrict 150, p. 103A.
Find A Grave, "Stephen A. Harris (1834-1895)," Memorial #172735341, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/172735341 (accessed August 28, 2020).
